string.value: You lost the #t1912034#! What to do? Ask #b#p2060005##k in #b#m230000000##k to make you another saddle.

#p2060005# is angry that you lost the saddle he made you and says that he will make you another saddle only if you give him #b60 million mesos#k in addition to the #bsame materials as before#k.

#i4032504# #t4032504# #b#c4032504# / 10#k
#i4032505# #t4032505# #b#c4032505# / 2#k
#i4032477# #t4032477# #b#c4032477# / 2#k
#b60000000 mesos#k
You received the #t1912034# from #p2060005# after getting all the materials again and paying double the mesos. Be careful not to lose it again...
Hello. How are you enjoying your saddle? Wait, where is your saddle? Eek! You want me to make you another saddle? You didn't lose the saddle, did you?
I worked so hard to make such a nice saddle for you. How could you lose it? You really don't take care of your stuff. Honestly, I really don't want to make another one for someone like you...
But, fine. I'll make you a new one just this once. There is a condition however. You'll have to bring me the materials just like before but you'll have to pay double the fee.

You do remember what the material are right? #b10 #t4032504#s#k from #m211000000#, #b2 #t4032505#s#k from the Shipwrecked Treasure Chests deep inside Aqua Road, #b2 #t4032477#s#k, a specialty product of #m251000000#, and...
You will also need to pay me a #bfee of 60 million mesos#k. It may seem like a lot but I'm charging you extra this time so that you won't lose it again. I will be waiting.
Are you refusing because the fee is too high? You shouldn't have lost it in the first palce. I won't lower the price.
You brought all of the materials. Please give them to me along with the fee.
Here is the newly made saddle. Please use this incident as a lesson and be careful not to lose it again.

You didn't forget what the materials were did you? I will make a new saddle for you if you bring me #b10 #t4032504s# from #m211000000##k, #b2 #t4032505#s#k from the Shipwrecked Treasure Box deep inside Aqua Road, #b2 #t4032477#s#k, a specialty product of #m251000000#, and a fee of #b60 million mesos#k.
